website_summaries.verdict: Attractive, effective black masks for the filtration of flu germs, allergens, and other irritants.
pros: Breathable with an active carbon filter
Four layers of material in each mask
Masks fit well and look good
cons: Some complaints about a chemical odor in the masks

customer_reviews.title: Not for the chemically sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. The reason I am giving it a four rating are: 1. It smells like glue and isn't very breathable. If you are sensitive to smells or have trouble breathing due to allergies, you will quickly notice. 2. It has a residue. The first two weeks of using this product my face swelled. In fact my skin continues to feel stiff using this product. I find it helps to shake vigorously and air out the mask before using it. I am going to buy my second box if I have any more skin reactions I will chalk this off as not for me. Great odor cancellation once you get past the mild suffocation and glue smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sarta

customer_reviews.title: If you like a heavy chemical smell, go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't use these. I tried, but the smell was so bad I had to remove immediately. I tried to air them out to see if was just from being in a sealed bag that didn't work still smelled of terrible chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Ok product. Not great. But it will do for home use. I do not recomend this for medical use or extreamly dusty conditions. The masks are individualy wrapped and are realy soft. However they are thin and the top nose pink are dosen't secure very well, the side of the cheeks opens up more than other medical grade masks and allows for an entry way for dust and debris. Delivery was super late. Did not arrive on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wet face
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the way my nose and mouth get wet inside of this mask. I prefer a vented mask. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: I like this one better than others that have cute patterns
customer_reviews.text: I have bronchitis and currently live in a very windy desert. I like this one better than others that have cute patterns, they cause my nose itching like crazy. This is so comfortable to wear all day, no itching at all. Also they are each independently wrapped to make sure absolutely no dust on them after the whole package is open, no other seller's black masks have this seller's feature of the independent protection of each mask. It makes a huge difference. BEST MASK for bronchitis or any respotorial problem.
customer_reviews.author: g3heavenlyfruit

customer_reviews.title: Smell badly
customer_reviews.text: Smell badly, ended up not using even one piece at all
customer_reviews.author: Qin J.

customer_reviews.title: they work and they're good quality. Each one is individually wrapped
customer_reviews.text: hard to get excited about dust masks, but hey, they work and they're good quality. Each one is individually wrapped
customer_reviews.author: NotSoFastEddie

customer_reviews.title: Definetly Buying More Soon😃!
customer_reviews.text: Placed my order Two days ago and recieved my order today. I was so impressed with the quality and that the masks are individually wrapped. I am a nail technician in training and my teacher said to order Carbon Filter Masks. The Nail Supply Store only had blue I love that these are Black, they look more elegant. Overall an excellent buy !
customer_reviews.author: t.

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear a mask in certain public situations. I’ve tried many different dust and surgical masks. I am really pleased with the quality of theses masks. The material is breathable and I don’t feel my breath in the mask as I exhale. The fit is perfect and stays in place throughout the day. The material is also sturdy - many masks I’ve tried tend to tear at some point throughout the day. Each mask comes in it’s own individual wrapper. This is a great price for 50 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for blocking dust, coughs, pollen, and other allergens -- fashionably at that! It also provides the best value and quality compared to others I've used. I could easily breathe through these; although it makes my face a little too oily after wearing one for too long, it is easily fixed by wearing a new one. Each mask is individually wrapped as well, so there's no need to worry about exposure in storage. Definitely would buy again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: These masks are great, and I get compliments all the time!
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best. I get compliments all the time on these face masks. I use them when I'm going around NYC, when I'm sick and need to breathe in warm air, and when it's cold and I don't want the wind to hurt my face. You need this mask!
customer_reviews.author: adreagayle

customer_reviews.title: A mask that is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Before this COVID-19, I had bought these because I clean kennels and the most from the disinfectant gets to my lungs. So, in hindsight I'm glad I purchased these when I did. They are comfortable and seem thicker than the regular cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: sigkap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this horrendous flu season
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for this horrendous flu season. If nothing else, it gives me peace of mind when I see other people coughing around me
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for flu season
customer_reviews.text: Like the look of this mask. They are individually sealed so I can leave them out at my desk at work so anyone concerned about spreading germs during flu season can take one. Not a germaphobe but for some reason people at my work like to work when they are sick and share their germs. I can't afford to be sick. Simple as that. Added plus - I look like a Kpop Idol wearing a black mask! Daebak!
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Minuth

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, all the masks come in a tissue like box so when you need one, it's covered in plastic which is great and you pull it out and use it. I tried one on to see if it would fit my face, I have a big face/head, it works great, just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars - Love the stye
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I mainly use them when I go to the Casinos (shout out to Pala Casino and Valley View Casino). I don't smoke by I like to play in the smoking section because they usually have better (video poker) machines there. Very stylish I think.....does not look like ones you see used in hospitals or clinical settings. Helps from smelling smoke from the person smoking next to you.
customer_reviews.author: RioHard91

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. My work has an unfortunately high level ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. My work has an unfortunately high level of particulate and mold spores. When I wear this mask I notice my cough and allergies are greatly reduced. Took a while to accustom to the fit as I am a small lady and have a small face, but I now like the fact that the mask can pleat out to fit over the nose and under the chin to achieve a pretty full coverage with little visual distraction when looking down at work. Took some getting used to, but now a staple, highly recommend. Small faces can be fully protected, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good temporary protection
customer_reviews.text: As an Uber I get a ton of coughing and hacking people in my car all the time. Before I got these, I always got sick. Now I haven't been sick in over a year since buying my first pack. If you don't care about getting sick, they can last a very long time before the strap eventually snaps They do get uncomfortable around the ears if u wear them too long but they're strong and good quality. I definitely recommend these if you're getting an Uber or airplane
customer_reviews.author: B17 Bomber

customer_reviews.title: Love these mask.
customer_reviews.text: They are seriously amazing. Most mask have a smell to them but these are individually wrapped and very nice quality. Love the black. Made so well!! Thank you ✨
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Works well but could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I mow the grass. They fit pretty loosely at the bridge of the nose and give me the feeling that I'm not getting as much protection as I could with a better fit. Could use a little metal strip at the nose bridge to make them fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Verified/Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, effective, just be ready for everyone to look at you like you're crazy or a terrorist if you wear these on a plane.
customer_reviews.text: I definitely scare people on the plane and at airports WAY more than I used to with these on, but I haven't gotten sick on any flights since I started wearing these. Good stuff! Served their purpose well, and they're so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Sleak & Clean
customer_reviews.text: Nice carbon filter mask for working with light air contaminants in the air including flour, sawdust, and non-eco friendly cleaning supplies.
customer_reviews.author: William Cap

customer_reviews.title: I would repurchase in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: Due to a family member’s compromised immune system, our family has been wearing masks for 3 years. This is a favorite brand of ours. No smell, individual & hygienic outer wrapping, no face stains and breathable. Our only concern is when will it become available again?!
customer_reviews.author: Joli

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money😡🤬
customer_reviews.text: Junk but they look cool but do not work so don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jones

customer_reviews.title: If you want black surgical mask, these are the ones
customer_reviews.text: Very nice presentation, fits very good. Only problem is the comfortability around the ears. I work in the medical field and need to wear masks for long periods of time, around 30 minutes to an hour the elastic ear wraps almost cut the circulation off of my ear. It’s not a sharp pain but it’s a noticeably irritating feeling. But if you’re wearing these in short burst, definitely recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Mask
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I have a very low immune system, and these are really effective with the carbon layer. It takes getting used to wearing a protective mask in public, but no one even seemed to notice.
customer_reviews.author: Joan G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Masks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these masks because I have allergies and like to garden. Used the mask yesterday while gardening and it protected me from getting the usual allergy symptoms. It was comfortable to wear and did a good job of filtering out the pollen, I highly recommend this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M Ben-Or

customer_reviews.title: Saved me!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to wear this throughout the process of a keratin treatment at my salon. They tend to bother me due to my asthma. I was perfectly fine thanks to these masks! Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Modern looking masks with comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these masks and tried them on to do some work around the house and they are perfect. Easy to breath than the ones given in hospitals or the regular blue ones you see. You won't see the dirt getting on your face because it's black. Overall very comfortable and has no scent.
customer_reviews.author: FELIX TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I like these mask. Much better than the other ones I had ordered on Amazon. They don’t fog up my glasses like the other ones if you wear it right. I would definitely buy them again. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: People keep asking me where I got these. They're also way more durable compared to the masks I get from my cancer center. You can wear them for a while without getting that annoying thing where the mask starts to get sucked into your mouth when you try to breathe. They also look very cute and go well with most clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Teela Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Buy before catastrophe
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! Oddly enough, I bought them in January because I was planning a trip to China. Who could have imagined my trip would soon be canceled and there would be a global shortage of masks two months later. My timing was spot on for once in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Bown

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, individually sealed, adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for when i'm cleaning the house especially cleaning my cat's litter box. High quality and each mask is individually sealed. As there are horizontal folds along the mask, it can be adjusted to fit your face. Would buy again. I paid full price for this and was not paid to write a review.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: pretty good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I think it could fit around the neck and jaw just a little better. Overall it did the trick and pretty well. I'm sure it's not what they are intended for, but i used them during the last California wildfires. The air was gross. I ended up giving most away and will probably pick some more up to store.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good protection from smells, cold and flu.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced. Four layers and activated carbon means very good filtering. Although mask is not intended to be reused, I found no problem with a few uses if you are not in a very dusty environment for long time. A bonus- saves lips from drying out in cold weather. Very lightweight but obviously, it does attract attention if worn in public places.
customer_reviews.author: Jayant

customer_reviews.title: Top notch face masks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect masks, I tried the cotton reusable ones and found I couldn’t breathe. These masks allow me to breathe while also filtering the air. I get asthma attacks around cigarettes and these prevent that from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Julian

customer_reviews.title: Make ear loops stronger and a thicker metal at nose part
customer_reviews.text: This product is good I’m not happy because those ear holders they ripped as soon as you open to put on your face you cannot even use as soon you touch they separate from the masks I think they did on purpose so costumers buy more is a good product but earl oops not good and the nose clip is not strong enough to sealing the nose part air gets in by the nose space 🥴
customer_reviews.author: Chuyyy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought in 2019
customer_reviews.text: Bought these some time in 2019, came to be very useful all of 2020. People always ask where I found these "stylish" black masks. 5/5 didn't catch Corona so far.
customer_reviews.author: Z Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: My new masks
customer_reviews.text: I have used other surgical masks and I could not breath. With your mask I can breath while raking leaves that creates a lot of dust. I also like the ear loops.
customer_reviews.author: Bluemax190

customer_reviews.title: Hospital approved!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE that these are individually wrapped. They also definitely have an extra layer that make it more breathable somehow but DON’T let as much offending smells in. Trust me, when you deal with patients in isolation with gastric issues you WANT that. Even our hospital Infection control nurse gave me the green light on these. You do have to replace them after a couple of hours (they get damp if you talk a lot) but otherwise I will definitely buy again since I wear them EVERYDAY.
customer_reviews.author: Nourished Nat

customer_reviews.title: The face masks are great and they arrived when expected
customer_reviews.text: The face masks are great and they arrived when expected. I was pleasantly surprised to see that they are individually packaged; I was not aware prior to delivery. They give great protection. It's allergy season and it's time for spring cleaning. I would definitely order more when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love these face masks. Perfect size for my face. I love the individual wrap, which makes it more convenient to carry. We use them whenever someone is sick in our house. We also take them with us when we take flights.
customer_reviews.author: GreenTea

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered these and used them twice and they keep cigarette and perfume chemicals from getting to my lungs. As soon as I put then on it was like night and day. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad I bought these in 2019, using this during pandemic and of course allergies which was the original reason I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Poor design/scam/junk
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly designed. Nosepiece is so flimsy as to be ineffective, allowing free air/breath bypass in both directions, making the filter material useless. Ear loops are of very thin/fragile elastic, and tear free with any but the very slightest pressure, thus the masks can not be tightened sufficiently to be effective. I give this product one star only because Amazon does not list a "junk" rating.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Kuehn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This mask work great and look very stylish. Highly recommended to protect yourself. But be aware, it's not for virus protection but good for bad air.
customer_reviews.author: 2momo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Wifes is an RN, I am an exterminator, these are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: StormMaster

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: We only sneezed once while cleaning out the heating vents! We laughed! We looked like characters from our Kdramas! The masks hooked around the ears comfortably and we could squeeze pinch at bridge of nose for a snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t cover from my boat to chin like other face mask does. I’m a registered nurse so I wear mask often and these do not fit like multiple other brands do.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and individually wrapped. Super comfortable and doesn't make your face hot- also fits really well and is adjustable around nose area- going to order more and told friends about it.
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to find these individually wrapped! Although it will take a while for me to go through a box of 50 this will absolutely be a repeat purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mel White

customer_reviews.title: Fits a variety of faces.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for the price. They hold up well. They are a bit more robust than your average hospital mask. The way they are accordioned, you can keep it small for a pointy-face person, or expand it for those with huge fleshy-type faces.
customer_reviews.author: Dashing

customer_reviews.title: Great mask if you don't mind waiting months while it ships from China
customer_reviews.text: Great mask if you don't mind waiting months while it ships from China
customer_reviews.author: OnTheMountain

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking and allergy/dust masks
customer_reviews.text: Im a big dude and these masks fit me perfectly. They are easy to breathe in and look cool in the process (ala mortal kombat)
customer_reviews.author: Santiago bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in 2019 for domestic use for dust etc. So glad I had them as now I am using to go in public as masks are required and they are very hard to get plus the prices have tripled since. Comfortable, light weight, great quality and passes the candle test
customer_reviews.author: Ria Ramdial

customer_reviews.title: not as shown in picture. weird odor.
customer_reviews.text: not as show in picture, in the picture they are individually packaged, but they came in a one bag. also has a weird smell, similar to old paper mixed with someone i cant quite make out. looks cool, but im not so sure if i feel comfortable wearing it for germ/dust (as advertised)
customer_reviews.author: BeeMo

customer_reviews.title: You will get strange looks in public...
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely necessary for cold and flu season. If you are immunocompromised or just a decent human being who doesn’t want to get other people sick, you need this. I think because it’s black it weirds people out, but I think it looks cool, like an anime character in a post-apocalyptic..NVM, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: comeoutpunching

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This gaps a little at sides; maybe due to me being small frame??? I wished it were a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: JanT.

customer_reviews.title: great for outdoor allergies
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad allergies, rag weed, cedar and mold. i love doing work in the garden and this mask is allow me to do work outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: ppca

customer_reviews.title: Face doesn’t get hot
customer_reviews.text: I was actually quite surprised by these. My face didn’t feel sweaty or hot at all. It was a big difference from the other ones I was using. I think they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeQueenT

customer_reviews.title: It did help not at all for my mold allergy.
customer_reviews.text: Not good for me . I have severe outdoor mold allergy. I kept coughing and it was not effective. Then I tried 3M -9210 N95 face mask and it was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: UNACCEPTABLE
customer_reviews.text: THE ELASTIC STRAPS WOULD BREAK 6/10 TIMES. THESE WERE ON PETITE WOMEN
customer_reviews.author: Garry Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable... works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I use them while doing yard work and cooking. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Great preventative
customer_reviews.text: Used to avoid breathing in dust while mowing. Did not obstruct my breathing while working.
customer_reviews.author: oolang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I use them for eyelash extensions. It helps keep the glue fumes away from me
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great face masks for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: All face masks are annoying in that they obstruct your face. But that's the point. These masks I use to clean my Airbnb, and they work wonders. Previously, I would sneeze and sniffle throughout the entire cleaning process from all the dust. With one of these one, I sneezed just twice, very few sniffles. Night and day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chella ready
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to for Coachella and long air travel
customer_reviews.author: Royce Jakob

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: These came in handy for traveling on a long flight. I used them from Atlanta to Qatar and then from Qatar to Singapore. I def recommend them. Keeps the germs away, yet still breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mask for COVID
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in 2019 because of recent wildfires in the area. The air quality was terrible and I wanted to be prepared for the next fire season. Now I use these to follow COVID mask mandates and I'm glad I had these on hand. They are light weight and cooler than cloth mask. The activated carbon really freshens the air.
customer_reviews.author: Francis  M Quitazol

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: What I got from them today wasn't even close to what they advertising here. It is blue three layer mask not black 4 layer mask. It is not individually wrapped either. The quality is bad. Don't buy this mask.
customer_reviews.author: JTB65

customer_reviews.title: Nail tech musta
customer_reviews.text: This mask are thick and durable for the price you get quality and quantity
customer_reviews.author: Natassja martinez

customer_reviews.title: Individually wrapped masks
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for them being individually wrapped. A little thicker than store bought dust masks b/c of the carbon layer making it black. Similar fit and finish to regular dust masks. 50 pieces is a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All my coworkers ask where I got them!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for work. And easier to breathe in....and let's not forget they are antibacterial with charcoal in it !!
customer_reviews.author: Trece

customer_reviews.title: No metal nose strip
customer_reviews.text: They're black like I wanted but don't have that metal strip for the nose contour which makes it a little more loose than it already is. Just a basic mask. Ear loops are fine and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These masks keeps dust out better than any other ones I ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Storey

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: These masks are individually packed, but they are on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rountree

customer_reviews.title: I hope they start selling these again
customer_reviews.text: i really liked these. they were comfortable and i could still breathe no problem. I would buy more if they sold again. very well made.
customer_reviews.author: karahmm

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Good masks! They don’t get super hot like some and I feel are a good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with black
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with black and the fit. . Glad I bought. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wiser-now

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Good value face mask
customer_reviews.text: The face mask is well made, comfortable and works as advertised. They were delivered on time and packaged individually in the manufacturer’s box.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Good price, works good as well
customer_reviews.text: Works good, better than those N 95 filter masks, but couple of this mask is defective... Right out from the package.
customer_reviews.author: Can Ye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: These are individually wrapped, very comfortable, and you can position them so that they don't fog up glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit very comfortably around the ears. There is a small wire across the nose that can be molded for a perfect fit. I wear these to mow the lawn and they are not hot or uncomfortable. I forget I'm wearing one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for airplane travel great product and being black they have that hospital look when you are in public. Best deal for the $
customer_reviews.author: My

customer_reviews.title: Protective and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It even helps with strong odors . I’ve been using it for work and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Approved
customer_reviews.text: They work well with decent material for the cost i would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steven L

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly cheap in price to be good but when I got them, to my surprise it was very durable. I gave two to each of my family members and they all enjoy them. It fits nicely and looks so minimalistic it's good for anyone to where for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the individual wrapped mask.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to prevent pollen allergy. The individual packaging makes carrying extras very sanitary. Will buy and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: No good against virus or bacteria!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a qualified surgical mask. I cut open the mask and found that the filter layer is not a non-woven fabric. This will not provide any protection against common virus (especially the Wuhan kind) or bacteria. I went back and found the box, made in China, no wonder!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ming

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Masks!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality and durability of these face masks! They are very efficient at filtering the floating dust particles and overall I am happy with the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: value for money, i liked them individually warped
customer_reviews.text: i use them to prevent dust, flu, and other allergents. they are individually warped. nice product and good value,will buy again
customer_reviews.author: icyicybaby

customer_reviews.title: Flu masks with class
customer_reviews.text: So far the product is as described. We will have to wait out the flu season to know for sure
customer_reviews.author: Ryly

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: They were very useful while visiting China. Helped filter poor air quality and secondhand smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Tapscott

customer_reviews.title: Individual packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Love that they are individually packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these at work as I use a blower indoors and it kicks up a lot of dust. I also work with cleaning chemicals and these help with exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Krieger

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Verdict is out. Kinda cheap but they may be as good as others.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny V Music

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They dont fit quite as well as the KC blue ones but the charcoal filtering is a plus
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: best mask EVER. I can't wait for them to become available again.
customer_reviews.author: talkerlonger

customer_reviews.title: quality may come into question. After all it is made in China.
customer_reviews.text: I start to question quality of a product when the box isn’t spell checked for errors. You might want to change “acticated” to “activated”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As an allergy sufferer they work great for mowing.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from terrible allergies and asthma and i wear these when I mow and i'm not near as miserable as i was not wearing any PPE. I also recommend a shower soon as you finish mowing to get all the pollen and debris off yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Yamde 50 Pcs Disposable Earloop Face Masks Dust Protection Four Layer Activated Carbon Filter Face Masks
product_meta.description: Yamde 50 Pcs Disposable Earloop Face Masks Germ Dust Protection Four Layer Activated Carbon Filter Face Masks
feature_bullets: High filtration barrier dust : Gentle on skin, breathability.
Superior four layer material (3 ply non woven fabric + 1 ply activated carbon)
Disposable Four Layer Activated Carbon Filter Face Masks,Filters out dust.
Elastic ear loops easily fit on & stay
